content.title: Intro
content.content:
1969
Preceded by
1969
1970
Year
1971
Followed by
1971

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1970.

content.title: January
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 315.
7 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to his grandson Michael George Tolkien.
15 - Musician Charles Deenen is born.

content.title: April
content.content: 12 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Tom Shippey.

content.title: May
content.content: 2 - J.R.R. Tolkien is awarded an honorary Doctorate of Letters by the University of Nottingham.

content.title: July
content.content: 18 - Author and scholar Ármann Jakobsson is born.

content.title: September
content.content:
4-7 - The first Mythcon is held at Harvey Mudd College.
11 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 316.

content.title: October
content.content:
31 - Actor Nolan North is born.
? - The first issue of Mallorn is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 317.
12 - Actor Craig Parker is born.
22 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 318.

content.title: December
content.content: 14 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to W.A.R. Hadley.

? - The staff of the Oxford English Dictionary compiles an entry for "hobbit".
? - Tolkien Criticism: An Annotated Checklist is published.
? - José Manuel Ferrández Bru, Spanish writer, is born.
? - Producer Belén Atienza is born.
Years
1967 1968 1969 1970 1971 1972 1973
